description_0: A turquoise metal sculpture of a unicorn is in the middle of the image in a bed of mulch facing the right side of the image. The unicorn is standing on its hind legs with its front legs kicked up. There are two red metal dragon sculptures behind the unicorn facing the right side of the image. Their heads are both tilted up with their mouths open toward the top right corner of the image. There is a row of gray pots at the top of the image with garden stake decorations sticking straight up out of them. A gray cement walkway is visible at the very top of the image, there are people walking to the right visible in the top left corner of the image.
description_1: A close up front view of a gray stone chinese statue with its base placed upon a small area of pebbles and dried brown leaves, the statue's face is smiling and facing toward the right of the view. Behind the statue is a black railing attached to a concrete walkway surface outside of a tan brick building. To the left of the concrete surface is a red painted wooden platform that is adjacent, leveled, and touching the concrete walkway. A chair can be seen on the wooden platform and a window with a white window and green painted outward blinds. The view is very visible from natural sunlight, the top of the statue on its face the sunlight shines partially on the top.
